title: In The Dream
alternative_title: She Meng ; Shè Mèng ;摄梦 ; 摄梦
status: She Meng ; Shè Mèng ;摄梦 ; 摄梦
description:
Description :
        In The DreamWang Zhan, who met an accident and destroyed his face, somehow he obtained an ability to interrogate dream during a desperate situation where he can enter people's dream and uncover the secret hidden in their heart. By completing the task given by The Goddess, Wa** Zhan slowly discovered the truth behind the accidents that happened to his family, and he is planning on how to take revenge..
